Accepted Payment Types:
We accept all major credit and debit cards securely through PayPal, or you can use your PayPal account. Our PayPal account is a verified business account, so you do not have to have a PayPal account to make payments!

24x7x365 Tech Support:
We offer 24x7 support to our clients via email, or our client area for issues that are urgent. We respond to all tickets within an hour but, this may vary depending on the number of tickets being submitted!
